Posts.Content: Diane:I had breast cancer and radiation treatments this year. I am on the Femara since May and now I am having severe pain in the uppper arms having a hard time getting the bra fastened with arms backward. I have an appointment with my onocologist Dec 1st..this has been going on for around 6 weeks..pain getting worse. Maxine
Posts.Title: Femara Side Effects

Posts.Content: I am a recent breast cancer survivor and had mastectomy in april ,33 radiation treatments. I began Femara May and for the past 6 weeks am having severe upper arm pain and can hardly get the prosthesis fastened with my arms bending backwards.Sometimes it feels like electric shock in the upper arms. Maxine

Posts.Title: Femara Side Effects

Posts.Content: I am suffering from the radiation burns under the armpit of the left side. It is oozing,red, and burns like fire. I am using the Silvadene ointment for a week and cannot see a difference in the burn. I go back to the doctor on Tuesday and hope he has a better answer to this problem....   Maxine Pettit
Posts.Title: Treatment Of Radiation Burns
